idea-plugin.name: Machine Learning in Find Usages
idea-plugin.description: The plugin is collecting anonymized data for training a machine learning model to improve the performance of the show usages and find usages features. It will introduce this model for the 253 version.

registryKey.description: When false, all functionality from the findUsagesMl plugin will be disabled.

When true, the old implementation of find usages will be used and FileRankerMlService calls will be made, but the results of ordering will be ignored. When false, find usages will use the new implementation.
